short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension saves Lampoon posts for offline organization and viewing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lampoon It - The best way to save all of your favorite posts and comics from www.harvardlampoon.com


View all of your saved posts in a scrolling feed for easy reading!

Open saved posts in new tabs free from distractions!

Filter your feed by tagging your saved posts however you like!
